# impactflu

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/khvorov45/impactflu.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/khvorov45/impactflu)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of impactflu is to provide functions to analyse the impact of 
influenza infections following from 
[Tokars (2018)](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.vaccine.2018.10.026)

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("khvorov45/impactflu")
```
